meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>neighbor</kanji> <kanji>country</kanji> is a <vocabulary>neighboring country</vocabulary>. For us, our 隣国 in America are those sneaky Canadians... always waiting to strike, I can tell...
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out for the rendaku.
